title: Two found shot dead in Khuzdar - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
KHUZDAR: Two men were found shot dead in the Zehri area of Khuzdar district on Wednesday, officials said.

According to Levies officials, Noor Gama area residents informed the local administration about the presence of the two bodies.

Subsequently, Levies personnel reached the spot and shifted the bodies to the Khuzdar hospital. The victim were identified as Rehmatul-lah Jattak and Munnwar Tarasani. According to Levies officials, investigation is underway.

Published in Dawn, August 14th, 2025
